item.title: 'City Hunter Movie: Tenshi no Namida' Reveals Additional Cast, Staff, Trailer
item.description: The official website of the City Hunter: Tenshi no Namida (City Hunter The Movie: Angel Dust) movie revealed on Tuesday additional cast, staff, opening theme, key visual (pictured) and a trailer. The movie is scheduled to open in theaters on September 8. Cast Angie: Miyuki Sawashiro (Lupin the Third: Mine Fujiko to Iu Onna) Shin Kaibara: Kenyuu Horiuchi (Dorohedoro) Pirarucu: Tomokazu Seki (Fate/stay night) Espada: Subaru Kimura (Jujutsu Kaisen) Staff Director: Kazuyoshi Takeuchi (Soukou Kihei V...

item.title: Manga 'Snack Basue' Gets Anime
item.description: An official website opened for an anime adaptation of Forbidden Shibukawa's Snack Basue manga on Tuesday, revealing the first key visual (pictured). The story is set in a snack bar named "Snack Basue," situated in Sapporo City, Hokkaido. Shibukawa began serializing the gag manga in Young Jump magazine in July 2017. Shueisha shipped the 12th volume on November 17, with the 13th volume scheduled to go on sale on June 19. Official site: https://snackbasue.com/ Official Twitter: @snac...

item.description: The official website of the Hoshikuzu Telepath (Stardust Telepath) television anime revealed two additional cast members, the music composer, and a teaser promo on Friday. item.title: Manga 'Hananoi-kun to Koi no Yamai' Gets TV Anime in 2024
item.description: Publisher Kodansha opened an official website for a television anime adaptation of Megumi Morino's Hananoi-kun to Koi no Yamai (A Condition Called Love) manga on Wednesday, revealing a teaser visual (pictured). The television anime is set to premiere in 2024. Morino began drawing the romance manga on the Dessert magazine in December 2017. Kodansha shipped the 12th volume on January 13, while the 13th volume is scheduled to be released on June 13. The manga has a cumulative 3.8 million copie...

item.title: Hiro Mashima Begins New Manga 'Dead Rock' in July
item.description: The July 2023 issue of Monthly Shounen Magazine announced on Tuesday that Hiro Mashima is launching a new manga titled Dead Rock. The manga will begin in the magazine's August issue on July 6. Mashima also announced that the manga will have a short-term serialization. The manga takes place in a dark fantasy Demon Academy called Dead Rock, which is a demon king training institute that rules over the depths of the demon world. Yakuto, a young Demon World dweller, is challenged to the arduous...

item.title: 'Shin Tennis no Ouji-sama: U-17 World Cup' Gets Sequel in 2024
item.description: The official website of the Tennis no Ouji-sama (The Prince of Tennis) franchise announced a sequel for the Shin Tennis no Ouji-sama: U-17 World Cup (The Prince of Tennis II: U-17 World Cup) television anime on Sunday. Subtitled U-17 World Cup Semifinal, the sequel depicting the semifinal match between Japan and Germany will premiere in 2024. The website also revealed a logo featuring the teams' colors (pictured). The U-17 World Cup television anime aired in 13 episodes in Summer 2022, mark...
